pr_title: Add default value of Glue GetPartitions MaxResults

timeline.bodyText: why 128 and not some other value (e.g larger)?
timeline.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText: Ultimately we need to find a balance between how much data you transfer at once vs how many iterations do you need on average for a typical use case. 128 is much larger than the current default (1) so I would start with this. I also think that we could make this configurable. What would you like to see as the default value instead?
replies.author: l1x

replies.bodyText: Is there some value that @l1x recommends?
replies.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText: haha. I meant what AWS recommends?
replies.author: sopel39

timeline.message: Add default value of Glue GetPartitions MaxResults
